name: JellyKrarken Deck
author: Werd Web Dev
description: Epic Duels–compatible deck for the cosmic leviathan JellyKrarken.

cards.name: Reality Rends
cards.rulesText: Deal 4 damage to every enemy in a 3-hex burst; those hit become Vulnerable.

cards.name: Cosmic Undulation
cards.rulesText: Gain a 6-point shield and draw 1 card.

cards.name: Eldritch Undertow
cards.rulesText: Pull one enemy 3 squares, then teleport JellyKrarken 3 squares.

cards.name: Tidal Crush
cards.rulesText: Place a 2×2 watery wall that blocks line-of-sight for 1 round and deal 4 damage to foes it touches.

cards.name: Riptide Shield
cards.rulesText: Gain Armor and deal 2 damage to all adjacent enemies.

cards.name: Predatory Lunge
cards.rulesText: Move 4 squares ignoring terrain, then deal 4 damage to an adjacent enemy.

cards.name: Terrifying Roar
cards.rulesText: Opponent discards 1 random card and is Stunned.

cards.name: Gnashing Tentacles
cards.rulesText: Deal 3 damage to up to two adjacent enemies and inflict Bleeding.

cards.name: Maelstrom of Madness
cards.rulesText: Create a 2×2 whirlpool; enemies entering take 3 damage and become Immobilized.

cards.name: Drag to the Deep
cards.rulesText: Pull one enemy 3 squares, deal 4 damage, and inflict Blinded.

cards.name: Kraken of the Void
cards.rulesText: Summon three 3-HP Void Tentacles adjacent; teleport to any water terrain, then each enemy within 3 squares takes 3 damage.

cards.name: Call of the Abyss
cards.rulesText: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck, keep 1, return the rest; each opponent chooses and discards 1 card.
